    • Method Detail

      • onMessage

        public <T> Listener<GroupMessage<T>> onMessage(String topic,
                                               Consumer<GroupMessage<T>> consumer)
        Registers a consumer for messages sent to the local member.

        The provided message consumer will be called when a message sent to the local member is received for the given topic.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The message type.
        Parameters:
        topic - The message topic.
        consumer - The message consumer.
        Returns:
        The message listener.
